start: ^Hey you! Have you heard what is happening in Pompeii?
^There is a strange phenomenon there if you are interested find me there I'll fill you in with the details
goal_0: ^I see you are interested with these strange phenomenons.
^Inside this Pantheon gives you gifts that will make you more powerful but ofcourse...
^Power comes with a cost. Talk to the local blacksmith about the Pantheon and what powers it gives you
^Tell the strange guy sent you good luck Legionnaire.
goal_1: ^I love to eat people and food...
^Oh it's you. You were sent by the strange guy?
^I see that pantheon gives power but you will need to pay SOL to gain some of those power
^Once you pay the amount it is asking it will give you a random power that could help you throughout your journey.
^If that's all you need I need to eat more food.
